participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

sample_description.Description: Sample description: tissue type, i.e. blood, saliva, brain etc.
sample_description.ValueRange: whole blood; saliva; brain; urine; serum; plasma; CSF; IPS; Fibroblast; Neuronal Progenitor; skin biopsy; temporal cortex; lymphoblastoid cell line; unknown; semen; frontal cortex; parietal cortex; basal ganglia; Placenta; hair; occipital visual cortex; cerebellum; spleen; stool; muscle; kidney; liver; heart; cord blood; nasal swab; DNA; RNA

data_file_location.Description: dbGaP; NDAR; NIMH Genetics; AGRE; Sfari

biorepository.Description: Sample provider: i.e. NIMH_Genetics; ATP; Correil

comments_misc.Description: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data

seq_batch.Description: Sequencing batch: Date sent to sequencing facility

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

assay_marker.Description: Antibody used against histone protein in order to immuno-precipitate the chromatin

flowcell_id.Description: Flowcell identifier | multiple flowcells separated by ::

array_chip_platform.Description: Name of genotyping array chip used

array_chip_version.Description: Version of genotyping array chip used

rine.Description: RIN equivalent (RINe) value for assigning integrity values to RNA

source_tissue.Description: Brain tissue used to isolate the DNA/RNA i.e. | anterior cingulate cortex (ACC); dorsal anterior cingulate cortex (dACC); dorsolateral prefrontal cortex (DLPFC); cerebellum (CER); superior temporal gyrus (STG); Dura mater (Dura); Hippocampus (Hippo);
source_tissue.ValueRange: ACC; DLPFC; CER; dACC; STG; Dura; Hippo

sample_prep_batch.Description: Sample preparation batch OR DNA/RNA Isolation batch OR experimental batch
